meanings.sent1: She wondered whereto the path would lead.
meanings.sent2: He asked whereto they should go next.
meanings.sent3: Confused, she followed the map whereto it took her.
meanings.sent4: His dreams guided him whereto his heart desired.
meanings.sent5: The compass pointed whereto the hidden treasure lay.

meanings.sent1: He explained whereto the plan had failed.
meanings.sent2: She inquired whereto the project was successful.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked at her curiously, wondering whereto she was going.
meanings.sent4: The stars whispered secrets whereto only the night sky listened.
meanings.sent5: His eyes revealed emotions whereto words could not express.
